Elementos

scroll down ↓

Elementos is an interactive short-film in which the user has the possibility to navigate through the metaphor that unfolds in the form of dance throughout the story.

The film features two characters in two different nature elements. The action develops in the form of a danced poem where Earth and Water depart from their solitude to a harmony found in their union.
